Looking to see if previous projects had created testing websites
for crawlers, I came across Funnelback, a Java crawler I hadn't
heard of before. Their main page:

 http://dev.funnelback.com/

It is unclear if the source is available, and if so under what
license. 

They have a page they apparently point the crawler at to test
it:

 http://dev.funnelback.com/test.html

- Gordon
